text:
Hi all! I have 15+ years of experience in digital communications for nonprofits. I am seeking a new career direction in content marketing as a content writer/editor/strategist. Here is what I can bring to your company:

*Writing and content creation:* I’ve written on complex, technical topics such as project management and web technology and crafted compelling, well-written, and easy-to-understand articles for non-technical audiences. I’ve written and produced blogs, websites, e-newsletters, social media posts, technical documentation, and a chapter for a printed book. I also have experience as a freelance writer and editor producing SEO-optimized blogs and website landing pages for clients.

*Project management:* I am a strategic, organized, and detail-oriented project manager with a strong track record orchestrating complex web projects such as web redesigns, site builds, and content migrations. I work closely with stakeholders, program staff, and digital agency vendors to scope and implement these projects from concept, design, build, to launch. I am also a deadline-driven managing editor. I’ve implemented an editorial calendar to streamline the process of working with program managers, writers, editors, and subject matter experts to produce monthly and quarterly e-newsletters and to revamp web content.

To learn more about me visit my LinkedIn: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/redante> and my writing portfolio: <https://www.clippings.me/redante>

attachments.title: Redante Asuncion-Reed - Writing Portfolio

Here's my LinkedIn: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/shreya-rai-1a0342226/>
